description.value:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon
This seed must be used outdoors, and when thrown, it creates a well-built road through any terrain, up to 5 miles long. The road includes up to one bridge crossing for a stream or chasm up to 50 feet across, and it may likewise include supports, log causeways, or leveled sections along a single section of marsh, hillside, or even mountainous terrain.
A road seed combined with a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressitems.Item.KPtavernseed0000]{tavern seed} can generate a road twice as long as a road seed alone. A road seed can be countered or removed with an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.x5JNBSyIBBZsjcGT]{earthquake} or ebon tide spell.
